title: Says i must be level 12 or higher to post a comment, but i'm on a level 30 account...?
body: i saw a post saying that all some guy had to do was create a discussion and it reinstated that he was in fact a lvl 30 too

replies.body: Yup, a post like this causes a manual sync between your Summoner and Boards profiles. It looks like the sync worked for you, since you now show up as level 30. Happy posting!
